Method Detail

connect

public boolean connect(IP.IpAddress dst,
                       int port)
Connect this socket to the specified destination and port.

Parameters:
dst - the destination to connect to
port - the port to connect to
Returns:
true if the connect succeeded.

accept

public void accept()
Accept a connection on this socket. This call blocks until a connection is made.

read

public int read(byte[] buf,
                int offset,
                int maxlen)
Reads bytes from the socket into the buffer. This call is not required to return maxlen bytes every time it returns.

Parameters:
buf - the buffer to read into
offset - the offset to begin reading data into
maxlen - the maximum number of bytes to read
Returns:
the number of bytes read, or -1 if an error occurs.

write

public int write(byte[] buf,
                 int offset,
                 int len)
Writes to the socket from the buffer.

Parameters:
buf - the buffer to
offset - the offset to begin writing data from
len - the number of bytes to write
Returns:
the number of bytes written or -1 if an error occurs.

close

public boolean close()
Closes the connection for this socket. Blocks until the connection is closed.

Returns:
true unless no connection was open.
